Class LuceneIndexingHandler

java.lang.Object
com.sismics.docs.core.util.indexing.LuceneIndexingHandler
All Implemented Interfaces:
IndexingHandler
public class LuceneIndexingHandler extends Object implements IndexingHandler
Lucene indexing handler. Documents and files are indexed in Lucene, but only used for fulltext search. Other search criteria are still using the database.
Author:
bgamard
